name: calculate_frequencies_for_text_file
description: Calculates the frequency of words and characters in a text file, with options to filter by specific words or characters or limit top frequent words/characters.

file_path.description: The path to the text file to analyze.

word_list.description: A list of specific words to calculate frequencies for.

char_list.description: A list of specific characters to calculate frequencies for.

case_sensitive.description: Whether the frequency calculation is case sensitive. Defaults to false.

limit.description: If nither word_list nor char_list is not provided, the maximum number of top frequent words or characters to return. Default to 10.
